_comment: ------ On the Dynamics of Integration contents ------
general.integratedtunnels.description: 透過動態聯合的網路傳輸其他東西。
advancement.integratedtunnels.interface_: 製作一個物品傳輸接口
製作一個流體控制介面
advancement.integratedtunnels.import_all: 使用物品輸入口輸入所有的物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.export_ite: 使用物品輸出口向一個物品欄輸出，直到其裝有10個物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.import_ite: 使用物品輸入口向一個物品欄中輸入所有被列表標記的物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.export_enc: 在物品輸出口中使用能否附魔（enchantable）運算符以向一個物品欄輸出所有可附魔物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.filter_sto: 白天過濾物品儲存容器
使用物品過濾介面在白天過濾此物品欄
依據模組過濾物品儲存容器
使用物品過濾介面只傳輸指定模組的物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.drop_all_i: 用物品投擲口投擲所有物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.pickup_ite: 用物品拾取口一次拾取5個物品
advancement.integratedtunnels.break_ston: 用方塊破壞口挖掘石頭
advancement.integratedtunnels.place_logw: 用方塊放置口放置任何使用了「log」標籤列表的原木。
advancement.integratedtunnels.click_swor: 用玩家模擬器使用鑽石劍攻擊
parttype.integratedtunnels.interface_ene: 將一個能量電池連接到網路
parttype.integratedtunnels.interface_fil: 將一個能量電池連接到網路並進行過濾
parttype.integratedtunnels.interface_ite: 將一個物品容器添加到網路
parttype.integratedtunnels.interface_fil: Attaches an item inventory to the network and filter it
parttype.integratedtunnels.importer_worl: Pick up items from the world
parttype.integratedtunnels.interface_flu: Attaches a fluid tank to the network
parttype.integratedtunnels.interface_fil: Attaches a fluid tank to the network and filter it
parttype.integratedtunnels.importer_worl: Pick up fluids from the world
Pick up blocks from the world
aspect.aspecttypes.integratedtunnels.boo: If only exactly the given stack size is allowed to be moved in one tick, not less.
If the given NBT tag must be a subset of the item NBT tag.
If the given NBT tag must be a superset of the item NBT tag.
If true, all items without NBT tag will not be matched.
If nested NBT tags and list should be checked recursively
If only exactly the given fluid amount is allowed to be moved in one tick, not less.
If the given NBT tag must be a subset of the fluid NBT tag.
If the given NBT tag must be a superset of the fluid NBT tag.
若為 true，所有無 NBT 標籤的流體都不會被匹配。
嵌套 NBT 標籤及列表是否應被遞歸檢查
在 1 刻中，是否只有精確符合給定量大小的流體會被移動，而不是少於時也會移動。
當沒有掉落物時破壞方塊
方塊只有在產生掉落物的情況下才能被破壞
aspect.aspecttypes.integratedtunnels.int: 將選擇第n個實體。-1為隨機實體。
aspect.aspecttypes.integratedtunnels.boo: 是否必須模擬連續點擊，否則會每次點擊耗時 1 刻。
處理所有指定列表外的物品。
是否模擬潛行中（按住 shift）的玩家。
如果介面以輪詢調度的方式進行疊代，則忽略優先級。
是否只在槽內包含給定數量的原料的情況進行原料移動。
如果是空值作為過濾器則表示匹配所有，否則不匹配。
如果應在網路中不存在實例時，則crafting該實例。
如果目標可以向/從網路輸入/輸出。
過濾是否應用於網路置入
過濾是否應用於網路提取（包括查看）
If all ingredients should be passed if filter is disabled for ins/del.
aspect.integratedtunnels.read.long.itemn: Get the total amount of items in the network
The upper limit of the total amount of items that can be stored in the network
aspect.integratedtunnels.read.list.itemn: Get a list of all items in the network
aspect.integratedtunnels.read.operator.i: Get the total count of the given item in the network
aspect.integratedtunnels.read.integer.it: Get number of valid interfaces for item storage
aspect.integratedtunnels.read.long.fluid: Get the total amount of fluids in the network
The upper limit of the total amount of fluids that can be stored in the network
aspect.integratedtunnels.read.list.fluid: Get a list of all fluids in the network
aspect.integratedtunnels.read.operator.f: Get the total count of the given fluid in the network
aspect.integratedtunnels.read.integer.fl: Get number of valid interfaces for fluid storage

aspect.integratedtunnels.write.boolean.i: Export items if the boolean is true
aspect.integratedtunnels.write.integer.i: Export the given amount of items each tick.
Export items to the given slot. -1 is any slot, -2 or less is no slot.
Export Items Predicate
Export all items that match the given predicate.
Export all items that match the given NBT tag.
aspect.integratedtunnels.write.boolean.i: Import items if the boolean is true
aspect.integratedtunnels.write.integer.i: Import the given amount of items each tick.
提取物品到選定槽。-1為任意槽，-2及其以下不判定為槽。
aspect.integratedtunnels.write.list.item: 提取指定列表中的物品
提取指定列表中的物品。
輸出匹配運算符物品
提取與指定運算符匹配的所有物品。
提取與指定NBT標籤匹配的所有物品。

aspect.integratedtunnels.write.integer.f: Export the given amount of fluids each tick.

Export all fluids that match the given predicate.

info_book.integratedtunnels.introduction: &lIntegrated Tunnels&r is an extension to &lIntegrated Dynamics&r to transfer items, fluids and energy over &lIntegrated Dynamics&r networks.

You can use &lIntegrated Dynamics&r logic to configure filters, which can be as complex as you desire. &o"I want to send 3 enchantable pickaxes with a damage value less than 10 to this chest every tick"&r or &o"I want to fill this tank until it has 1000mB of oil, but only when my machine is working and if I have less than 10 iron ingots in this chest"&r No problem! &lIntegrated Tunnels&r can do that for you, and it will do it efficiently as well!
info_book.integratedtunnels.concepts.tex: &lIntegrated Tunnels&r adds 3 part types for the different transport types, namely &oImporters&r, &oExporters&r and &oInterfaces&r.
Importers (blue) always try to pull from a target, to Interfaces (white) in the same network.
Exporters (orange) always try to push to a target, from Interfaces (white) in the same network. Items in this case will always transfer from left to right.
You could add multiple interfaces to your network, and assign priorities to specify which should be filled/emptied first.
If you want to specify what ingredients can go through an interface, you can use a filtering interface. This can be useful if you for example want to lock inventories to only contain certain items.
Furthermore, you can also add multiple Importers and Exporter, again with relative priorities.
Using &lIntegrated Dynamics&r variables, you have to specify what items should be moved. If you want to keep it simple, and just move everything, simply use a blank &lVariable Card&r.

Note that if you have an autocrafting mod such as &lIntegrated Crafting&r installed, then you will be able to use the &oCraft&r setting in exporters. This will make it so that if an ingredient is not available for export, that it should be crafted.
info_book.integratedtunnels.item.text1: Move items over the network. Import items into the network using &lItem Importers&r into &lItem Interfaces&r. Export items from the network using &lItem Exporters&r from &lItem Interfaces&r. Dynamically filter what items can go through an interface using a &lFiltering Item Interfaces&r.
info_book.integratedtunnels.fluid.text1: Move fluids over the network. Import fluids into the network using &lFluid Importers&r into &lFluidInterfaces&r. Export fluids from the network using &lFluid Exporters&r from &lFluid Interfaces&r. Dynamically filter what fluids can go through an interface using a &lFiltering Fluid Interfaces&r.
info_book.integratedtunnels.energy.text1: Move energy over the network. Import energy into the network using &lEnergy Importers&r into &lEnergy Interfaces&r. Export energy from the network using &lEnergy Exporters&r from &lEnergy Interfaces&r. Dynamically filter if energy can go through an interface using a &lFiltering Energy Interfaces&r.
info_book.integratedtunnels.world.item.t: &lItem World Importers&r and &lItem World Exporters&r can be used to place items in the world, pick them up, and interact with entities that have an inventory, such as dropped Shulker Boxes and Donkeys. Various aspect properties exists to change things like dispensing, throw-velocity, pickup delay, pitch and yaw.
With &lFluid World Importers&r and &lFluid World Exporters&r, you can place fluid source blocks, pick them up and interact with entities that are a tank, such as dropped tank items. Various aspect properties exists to change things like whether or not a block update should be caused.
info_book.integratedtunnels.world.energy: The &lEnergy World Importers&r and &lFluid World Exporters&r help you interact with entities that have an energy buffer, such as dropped batteries.
The &lBlock World Importers&r and &lBlock World Exporters&r allow you to place blocks and break them. Various aspect properties such as silk touching are available.
info_book.integratedtunnels.player.text1: Any experienced Minecrafter knows that the less you have to click, the better. With the &lPlayer Simulator&r, you can automate away a large part of this tedious clicking. It allows you to automate clicking with any hand and item. Advanced properties allow you to change things like click positions and so on.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.in: This section contains several tutorials that help you to learn &lIntegrated Tunnels&r, the &lIntegrated Dynamics&r add-on for item, fluid and energy transfer.

&oInterfaces&r are parts that can be attached to &lCables&r. An item, fluid and energy version exists for them, which respectively connect to inventories, tanks and energy machines. &oInterfaces&r make the target accessible to the network.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.im: &oItem Importers&r will move items from the target towards one of the &oItem Interfaces&r. &oItem Exporters&r do the opposite, they will move items from any of the &oItem Interfaces&r to the target.
Place an empty &lVariable Card&r inside a &lItem Importer&r to import all items into the network from a target inventory.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.ex: Read the number of items in the target inventory using an &lInventory Reader&r, and only move items until the total number of items is larger than &610&0.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.im: Import all items a certain list to the target inventory. An item list can be created by reading it from any &lInventory Reader&r.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.ex: Export all enchantable items to the target inventory. This can be done using a certain &lOperator&r.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.fi: Using the &lFiltering Item Interface&r, attach a &lChest&r to your network, and only make its contents be available to the network if it's day (and not when it's night).

Using the &lFiltering Item Interface&r, attach a &lChest&r to your network, and configure a predicate-based filter that only passes items from the &lIntegratedDynamics&r mod. To do this, we will create a new operator that will take an &8Item&0 as input, and returns a &9Boolean&0 as output.

To do this, first create an &2Operators&0 value containing the &lRelational Equals&r operator. Next, create a &4String&0 containing the &lIntegratedDynamics&r value. And then, use the &lApply&r operator to partially apply your &lRelational Equals&r operator to your &4String&0 value.

As a next step, we have to create another &2Operators&0 value, but this time containing the &lItem Mod&r operator. And now, we can use the &lPipe&r operator to pipe our &lItem Mod&r operator into our partially applied operator from the previous step.

This result from the &lPipe&r operator can be placed into the predicate-based aspect of your &lFiltering Item Interface&r, and all variables we depend on need to be placed into a &lVariable Store&r. If all steps are followed correctly, the filter will only pass items from the &lIntegratedDynamics&r mod, which can be customized by changing our &4String&0 constant.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.wo: Simular to &oItem Importers&r and &oItem Exporters&r, &lWorld Item Importers&r and &lWorld Item Exporters&r can respectively pick up items from the world into your item network and place items into the world from your item network. Furthermore, these can also be used to interact with dropped items that have inventories, such as &oShulker Boxes&r.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.dr: Place an empty &lVariable Card&r inside a &lWorld Item Exporter&r to drop all items from the network on the ground.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.pi: Write a constant number &65&0 to a &lVariable Card&r, and place it inside a &lWorld Item Importer&r to pick up 5 items at a time from the target space.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.wo: Instead of dropping items in the world or picking them up, you can also break and place blocks using the &lWorld Block Importer&r and &lWorld Block Exporter&r. Various aspect properties allow you to change properties such as whether or not the blocks should be silk touched when breaking.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.br: Make a &lVariable Card&r containing a reference to the &8Stone&0 item value. Place this inside a &lWorld Block Importer&r to break only Stone blocks. Also have a look at the various aspect properties to see if you can manage to silk touch the Stone to avoid receiving just Cobblestone.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.pl: Try creating a system using the &lWorld Block Exporter&r that only places wooden logs. Do this using the &lOredictionary Values&r operator to retrieve a list of all items in the &ologs&r tag.
info_book.integratedtunnels.tutorials.cl: All this clicking and such can be quite boring, why not let a &lPlayer Simulator&r do it for you? Start by crafting one, and insert a &lVariable Card&r containing a &oDiamond Sword&r to let it attack autonomously using &oDiamond Swords&r from your item network.
